import React from "react" import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody, FormGroup, Row, Col, Input, Form, Button, Label } from "reactstrap" import Checkbox from "../../../../components/@vuexy/checkbox/CheckboxesVuexy" import { Check, Star, Save, Send } from "react-feather" import { history } from "../../../../../src/history" class OpSsCreate extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { myProfile:null, step: 0, cffNik: '', cffName: '', cffKondisiSaatIni: '', cffKondisiDiusulkan: '', } } componentDidMount = async() => { await this.isLogin('op_df'); } isLogin = async(role) =>{ if (localStorage.getItem('account') == undefined || localStorage.getItem('account') == null) { history.push("/pages/login") }else if(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('account')).role !== role){ history.push("/pages/login") } else{ var myProfile = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('account')) console.log('myProfile ss : ', myProfile) this.setState({myProfile: myProfile}) } } render() { return ( <> {this.state.step == 0 ? CFF Form
this.setState({cffKondisiSaatIni: val.target.value})} value={this.state.cffKondisiSaatIni} placeholder={'Jelaskan kondisi saat ini'} required /> this.setState({cffKondisiDiusulkan: val.target.value})} value={this.state.cffKondisiDiusulkan} placeholder={'Jelaskan kondisi yang diusulkan'} required /> this.setState({cffAlasanPerubahan: val.target.value})} value={this.state.cffAlasanPerubahan} placeholder={'Jelaskan alasan perubahan'} required /> this.setState({cffDampakPerubahan: val.target.value})} value={this.state.cffDampakPerubahan} placeholder={'Jelaskan dampak perubahan'} required /> {/* */} {/* } label="Remember Me" defaultChecked={false} /> */} {/* e.preventDefault()} > Submit next Reset */}
